title: Stolen phone sold as unlocked
reviewContent: Item was listed as unlocked and when I received it, the phone wouldn't work with my carrier. I called ATT and the phone is listed on the national stolen list. This phone cannot be used period.

title: Scammer
reviewContent: I didn't get a phone. I opened the package and found clay!!!

title: Missing phone!
reviewContent: Received only the charger!! No phone in box! Paid alot of money and now I'm screwed for my daughters big Christmas surprise! Beyond pissed!

title: Has a good SPEC case on it
reviewContent: When I first got the phone I was extatic! Couldn't believe I got an Iphone 6 plus for the 389 price. Phone worked perfectly for a couple days. I did inspet the phone and noticed a small indentation on the back mid way bottom but it was so slight. Called my daughter on the phone. Put the phone down and picked up to call again and the screen was frozen. I am 60 years old and am very careful with my electronics. Has a good SPEC case on it. DID NOT EVER DROP IT. I googled how to fix and did everything that was suggested. Nothing worked. Drove to the Apple store and was very impressed I only has to wait 5 min to be waited on. The Apple guy showed me how to tell if phone had been dropped or "bent" as he called it. He put his finger on the back and thumb on the front and squeezed and the phone started flickering. Only way to fix was replace phone. It cost me $150 dollars to get a refurbished Iphone 6 plus that has a 90 day warranty. Yes I could have returned the phone to person I got it from oh Amazon but where can I get an Iphone plus unlocked to use on my straighttalk carrier for 550? I did ask the person I bought from to reimburse as the Apple guy said the seller knew the phone was deffective and shouldnt have sold it. I have not heard from the seller as of yet. I realize its buyer beware and I have learned my lesson. Hope this helps another buyer.

title: I received the phone with multiple scratches and touch screen ...
reviewContent: I received the phone with multiple scratches and touch screen didn't work; however, I got my money back without problems.

title: Very disappointed that my phone came in this condition
reviewContent: Fast shipping, but the phone however glitched out and had a grey flickering bar at the top of the screen & also had an unresponsive touch screen when I turned it on. From my research & understanding it has "touch disease". Very disappointed that my phone came in this condition. However, very satisfied with how fast it shipped.

title: I phone 6pluse is really good one thanks amazon
reviewContent: I brought iPhone 6 pulse from amazon it's really good for me

title: Five Stars
reviewContent: Came in packaging! In brand new condition. Worked perfectly. No complaints

title: Great phone minimal damage just one problem when you go ...
reviewContent: Great phone minimal damage just one problem when you go to take a picture the shutter sound that you get is very loud and is not able to be turned off I took it to the Apple Store and they said it was something to do with the internal software and they could not shut it off but other than that it is great

title: Give Apple a chance, don't be such a fanboy!
reviewContent: So I've using android for almost 3 years and wanted to try something new. I've had the note 2, 3 & even an s5. Which are all great phones. But android got so boring to me. I've loved the look of iOS 8 ever since Apple changed the look of their os. So I figured why not try the iPhone. Not only does the phone feel premium but the os does too. Phones aren't getting any cheaper unless they're old ones. So don't think you have to be rich to get an iPhone! I'm by no means rich. The battery life on this phone is a champ. With lite to heavy use, I can't can't kill my battery in a single day. So big phone but if u like your battery to last u most of the day consider the 6plus. ((DO NOT GET A 16GB IPHONE!!!!)) your space will be gone Ina snap. I don't even know why apple offers a 16GB option.. Only thing I'll miss is having back & menu buttons android phones had. Other then that, this phones smooth, and it just works! Dont listen to the fanboys/girls. My iPhone has a lag here & there but it's still fast %98 of the time! But if it lags just go into ur settings and turn off stuff you don't use or need. thanks for reading consumers !!!
